channel.title: Influenza on Bai Hei
channel.description: Recent content in Influenza on Bai Hei

item.title: Influenza
item.description: During summer 2018, I worked with Prof. Michael W. Deem on prediction of vaccine efficacy as a visiting undergraduate researcher at Rice University, Houston, TX. We combined pEpitope theory with generalized NK model (both are developed by Deem’s group) in different ways and find a method to predict vaccine efficacy of H3N2 just from sequence information and statistical mechanical model. It is a pretty good prediction with an r-squared equals to 0.
